pages.text: $(li)Minecart with TNT are a new variant of the common Minecart.$(br)$(li)As the common TNT, if a TNT explotes it will break near blocks and inflicts explosion damage to near creatures.
$(li)The TNT contained in the Minecart can be detonated in multiples ways.

pages.title: Ways to explote TNT
pages.text: $(li)If it moves over a Activator Rail.$(br)$(li)If it is destroyed while in motion.$(br)$(li)If it is destroyed by fire, lava, or an explosion.$(br)$(li)If it is hit by a Fire Charge.
